text:
March
Twenty-sixth
19 4 0
Mr. M. 3. Novik
Radio Station WYNC
Municipal Broadcasting System
Hew York City
Dear Novik:
Yes, Joe Wright and I both plan to attend
the Ohio State meeting ddring the last part
of April. Really it is a pretty good meeting
and for myself I have learned a good many
things by attending a session or two there
previously. Joe has only missed one in about
10 or 11 years- A good many NAEB members
get to this meeting and no doubt you have
noticed that we have one reserved for ourÂ¬
selves the first day or rather I should say
night.
Cordially,
Frank E. Sohooley
FES/rep
